title: Can help me narrow down what font is used?
content:
This font is on this website: [http://us.burberry.com/store/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130627073337/http:/us.burberry.com/store/ "http://us.burberry.com/store/") in the navigation bar "store locator", "Customer Servuce" and the side bar "site map" "corporate" and "legal"

Your help is appreciated
